_first.description:
You are have suddenly appeared on a picturesque street in a small countryside village. You do not know how you got here but you see a small glow to the north.

Type help for a list of valid actions.

street.description: You are now outside a house.  There is a light on inside.

chimney.description: You find yourself in a dark and sooty chimney.  You do not know why you decided to climb the roof and squeeze into the chimney but here you are.

livingroom.description: You feel much better.  It is warm.  There is a roaring fireplace and you see some milk on a table.  You take a quick sip - the least you deserve for climbing that chimney.  There is a door to the west, and some stairs in front of you.

kitchen.description: You open the fridge and put some more mince pies in your pocket. The living room is back to the east.

bedroom.description: You climb the stairs and enter the first bedroom.  There are some presents by the foot of a bed.

_end.description: You are a bad, bad man.  But you win - well done.

_null.eat: You take a mince pie out of your pocket and sit for a short time enjoying it's cold fruity filling.
_null.help: Try typing one of the directions, 'i', 'me', or something else.
_null.me: You are wearing a red, silk suit and have a white wooly hat on.
_null.i: You are holding a sack, you suppose it may contain potatoes.
